website_summaries.verdict: In general, the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 7 has made a lot of users satisfied because of its performance and design. Aside from its excellent construction, the shoe also provides the right amount of support that is needed on different paved surfaces. Although some of them have problems with the shoe's price and size, others still recommend the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 7 because of its versatility. It is an excellent option for those who are looking for a comfortable and quality running shoe.
pros: A lot of runners said that the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 7 was best for walking, running, and cross-training
The shoe was comfortable, based on some reviews
Many testers commented that it was supportive
Some reviewers said that the shoe has no breaking in needed
A handful of buyers were impressed with the shoe's great-looking design
According to several wearers, the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 7 was lightweight
The majority of the buyers agreed that the shoe quickly adapted to all their running needs
cons: The shoe was expensive, according to some purchasers
Several testers observed that the grooves in the outsole quickly collected tiny rocks as they run
The Mizuno Wave Prophecy 7 was a little bit narrow for some users
One of the wearers said that the shoe ripped-off easily after several uses only

customer_reviews.title: Impact reduction on knees remarkable
customer_reviews.text: I own the Prophecy 6 and for sure the 7 is more comfortable on hard surfaces. There is tightness in the fit that other reviewers have alluded to! This is because it has a ribbing structure which is not on the 6 and for that reason, it makes the shoe taut and hence the squeeze. Try one size up. the blistering phenomenon disappeared after bedding in. Its a very smart shoe. I have under 100km on Prophecy 6, however i naturally prefer the 7. Its awesome. The high visibility safety features are so advanced that there is nothing like them on the market. They glow in low light in a very cool way. awesome for that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is substantially narrower then the wave 5. ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is substantially narrower then the wave 5. I have owned three earlier Wave Prophecy with only positive results. The Wave Prophecy 7 is not the same shoe as its predecessors. I have worn the Wave 7 for three workouts and it is giving me blisters on top of my feet. Not only can I no longer ware them but I am out a substantial amount of money because of the Amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris White

customer_reviews.title: Love my Mizunos for long distances.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for a wide foot and heavy runner. Add some heavy duty Thorlo XL’s and you should be good to go the distance. I buy a new pair every year for a hilly half marathon I jog, only to make sure I have the most possible cushion. But I still have all four pair the older pairs just get designated for rainy days, muddy courses, airline travel, etc. A++ foot care for a heavy runner.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jones

customer_reviews.title: Declining quality, very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time Mizuno Wave Prophecy wearer, and the quality has gone down over the years. I bought a new pair and they had loose stitching and glue stains around the soles. I asked for a replacement and when they arrived, that pair had the same defects. They still fit great but was nervous to keep such expensive shoes with visible quality issues. I returned both pair and look for something else to fill my closet.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker, buy a full sizer larger than usual
customer_reviews.text: They are well made and good running shoes. My only issue (besides prize) is that they seem to run small. I think I need a full size bigger in this shoe than other ones (e.g., I wear 11 in all my shoes, but likely need a 12 for this one - the 11 is VERY tight actually crunching the front of my toes). But the rest is good and I would recommend them - in a half to full size larger than you get in other sneakers. It might be the narrow curve in front is causing toe problems - the sole length seems normal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Skeet88

customer_reviews.title: Quality getting worse
customer_reviews.text: When I include pics, Amazon wont post my review. Ive owned every Prophecy since the 1st ones. I expected mizuno to learn from the mistakes and design flaws of the past styles to finally make a shoe that lasts longer than a couple months. Instead, they are just becoming an overpriced fashion shoe like the rest of them. I received my Prophecy 7 on 6/7/19. On 7/10/19 I noticed the stitching on the toe coming out. I rarely even wear them. I love the look of the shoe but until they start making their shoes WORTH the $240 price, im done with them.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes with nice design
customer_reviews.text: I have a Prophecy 3 that still good and I got this new Prophecy 7 as it was in a great price. As per my previous Mizuno, I got this one at Size 8 (I usually use size 7.5 from other brands) and it fits as my old one. It came in original box, and it seems never opened before. Very good quality and design and it is perfect for long walks or running. I got if for about $130 on a sale at Amazon. I won't pay full price of $230 for a tennis shoes (this or any other!!!) Recommended if you can get at the price I payed (or less) !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: 'Toby Christiana' Returns Have to go to China.  Good Luck if you get defective shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ride and durability of two previous Mizuno Prophesy shoe purchases. I weigh 170 lbs. As shown with included image, the rear plastic heel structure just broke. Toby Christiana is a Chinese seller which approved my return request, IF I PAY the SHIPPING CHARGES TO CHINA! I had to return the Prophesy shoes I previously purchased because the left shoe developed a loud 'squawk' with each step. So I've had two pairs of Mizuno Prophesy shoes I really loved and the last pair of Mizuno Prophesy shoes that are UNWEARABLE and cost prohibitive to return to China.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Palmer

customer_reviews.title: So freaking comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno makes the best shoes bottom line. I'm purchasing another pair soon just like these. Worth every penny. I'm always on my feet as a personal trainer so my feet never hurt after a long day. Feet are the most important part of your body so why invest in crappy shoes. These will last twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Jason king

customer_reviews.title: A Crap Shoe-- Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno continues to lag behind several brands when it comes to running shoes. These are just plastic crap...I think I may have seen these in a gumball machine. You can buy Asics or Saucony for same or lesser price, much better quality. Mizuno must be Japanese for junk.
customer_reviews.author: W. Merrette Moore

customer_reviews.title: The mens version looks just as good and fits better than most women's!
customer_reviews.text: I got these on deal of the day for $109. I had sent the other shoes back because the were too small. I have never spent over a Hundred for a pair of shoes. But diabetes has hit my world and I needed a good pair of all around shoes that were comfortable and offered more support than the average! Very pleased with these shoes! Will order again. I personally wear a woman's 11 in sneakers and most of the time they are just too small. Ordering a Men's size 10 going by shoes that I had purchased before, these fit comfortably and were very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of support but extremely narrow fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love Mizuno shoes. I’m a heavy runner and mizuno shoes are among the best I’ve ever worn. The wave prophesy however, ran ridiculously small. I put them on and while the heel support and weight of the shoes were exceptional, I couldn’t believe how tight they were at the front. There’s a steep taper toward the front of your foot that made me send them back after 3 minutes of wearing them. If you’re going to order them, order at minimum 1/2 size larger than normal. Doing so may however affect the fit at the heel. I replaced these with the wave inspire and am much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes as always, that’s mu 3rd pair of wave prophecy and they punctually deliver stability, confort and responsiveness especially on the long run. Not for everybody but for me best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable shoes for anyone that spends long days standing and/or walking at work. I’m 6’5 260lbs and have always had a difficult time finding a shoe that can hold up longer than a few months to the use I put them through. I work at massive University Trauma Hospital, I’m constantly running up and down stairs to multiple floors for emergencies or spending multiple hours standing in the Operating room. These shoes came highly recommended to me by a Neuro surgeon. I have owed 2 pairs of these now and I will never own any other shoe for work. Not only are they comfortable, but each pair have held up a solid 18 months of daily work abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jason White

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno's Wave Prophecy 4 was my all-time favorite running shoe: very soft strike for my overweight frame and it lasted about twice as long as my usual Asics Nimbus. But these Wave 7's were too narrow in the toebox and would numb my foot. I'd probably foot width "E": regular width ("D") shoes need to stretch out for the first few runs and wide ("EE") are a bit loose. But the Prophecy 4's quickly stretched and these Prophecy 7's I couldn't even walk comfortably in.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Prophecy shoes after wearing the Creation shoes the last 3 generations. I got these simply because there was a color scheme/size that happened to be the same price as the current generation Creation. I'm 6'5 and 210 lb's and have a history of ankle injuries (basketball) so stability is paramount. These shoes really deliver on the stability department and feel even more stable than then Creation shoes. I don't think these shoes are worth the price premium over the wave creation shoes, but if you can get them for $150 (like I did) then I think they are good value.
customer_reviews.author: t3hBar0n

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but good buy once on sale
customer_reviews.text: I made sure I bought the men's size. My foot size is normally a 7.5 in men but I had to go up a full size because it is made narrow. Thankfully I As time progress once they are broken they feel great. I love them for work because I do a 12 hour shift and I am on my feet constantly and I use them to work out. I need some good support.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have broken feet with fallen arches and sprint for 8 hours on one of my jobs. These shoes are great! No more worries about rolling ankles. able to comfortably turn on a dime in sprint mode. Thank you Mizuno!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe/ uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Runs small with a very uncomfortable construction in the rear bottom heel area. (Not enough room for your heel to lay flat). I exchanged for a half size larger but the heel area is the same. All of my other Mizunos fit and feel perfect. I will just end up wearing this one as an everyday shoe instead of a running shoe because it’s a really good looking shoe aesthetically.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Best for running
customer_reviews.text: Best for running, walking and cross training than any others that I have had. Stability, comfort etc are unmatched. My wife also got a pair and she too loves them. Your feet are worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney E Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno is the best running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Forget Nike, these shoes are definitely the best running shoe on the market. Superb appearance and look (even in plain black for my workplace). I get compliments everyday from my customers. The main thing is they are super comfortable, provide more than enough cushion for my feet and my legs feel strong even after 8 hours of constant standing/movement. Spend the money on quality shoes like these and you will never regret it. Nike is all hype, Mizuno is the high end of the Asics family.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing the Wave Prophecy 3 for the last several years because I really like them, however they have been extremely difficult to find as I suspect that Mizuno has discontinued producing them. I was somewhat anxious about purchasing an untried shoe, however I took a chance and purchased the Prophecy 7. They are without question a superior model. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lightness to them. They fit my feet well. Could be a little roomier in the sides, but not too bad. The cool see through bottom design gives them a nice bouncy feeling and a really nice look.
customer_reviews.author: GrimPhobos

customer_reviews.title: I believe I was deceived.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to buy these shoes. When I received the goods it was a big disappointment. There was no label that was buying an original shoe, the box was altered, honestly, it looks like a counterfeit and the worst ... The shoe was used (I put photos). The biggest problem is that this is a gift and we deserve original shoes as expected. The tennis shoes were returned and I think I won't buy expensive merchandise like this through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes to run long distances.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been running for the past 10 years and have tried almost every running shoes before using mizuno prophecy, I had prophecy’s for the last 5 years and they’re awesome. The prophecy 7 aren’t as expensive as prophecy 8 and they’re awesome if you run more than 10k on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: John Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Mizunos, but this model is bad. I bought and returned tow pairs twice. This model is alot narrower that the previous model and the construction has something hard digging into the top of your foot. I bought it on sale and hated to return it, but they just hurt my feet terribly
customer_reviews.author: rhody runner

customer_reviews.title: What is the problem here!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what's going on with Muzuno but this product is on a rapid decline as far as quality. I've been a fan since the Wave Prophecy 3 (best ever) was released but each subsequent series has gotten worse. For starters they've cut the shoe too narrow for comfort and too much pressure from impact will cause the heel to collapse. Very disappointing.....for the money spent you would expect a much much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but expensive at MSRP.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Hate the price. I bought these at a great price and love them. Now when they need to be replaced, I will have to watch for them to go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Murfdawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars plus
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. I have put a few miles on these already and their function and performance is a expected. I haven't own a Mizuno product since playing baseball in HS. The quality is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Jose P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. However, if you usually wear 7.5, you may need half inch larger one. Littlebit tight
customer_reviews.author: YOON CHUNG

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I jog in these shoes, this is my second pair of Wave Prophecy shoes. My first pair lasted my 3 years, but that was a stretch because the bottoms were almost completely bare. I only wear these shoes for running, but I found that I have fewer aches and pains in my joints with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but smaller than other Mizuno
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but despite I had other 4 Mizuno, this model fits too tight and I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I work as a Pharmacy tech and I am on my feet from anywhere from 8 to 10 hours. I am also a larger man so the stress on my feet is a lot. The wave in these shoes adds comfort but also gives a little spring in my step.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBearHorky

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe where the money goes into the materials!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid running shoe. You don't feel like you are standing on a platform but it absorbs excess energy before it runs up the legs and into the knees. Only complaint is the molded plastic is sharp (don't donkey kick anyone!) and the bottoms can get slightly slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Liparini

customer_reviews.title: Glittering but not the Muzino I know.
customer_reviews.text: It was too small and tight for a wide foot. I had a blister on my first run and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get'em
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Comfortable. I have semi bad knees, allows me to run, do sprints, and stadiums with little to no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Aric Long

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe for walking/jogging. I've had about 7 pairs. I didn't need a pair but brought these bcuz of the markdown
customer_reviews.author: tony shacklett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and is very comfortable! I did need to get a half size up from my normal size. Really happy with the decision on getting these. They are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery B

customer_reviews.title: The Best Running Shoes on the Planet.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and as always Mizuno never disappoints. I will always be a Mizuno fan for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Mizunos and have always purchased online, but I think I won't anymore, this particular shoe fit small.
customer_reviews.author: Al Trevino

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shoe. impressive engineering design
customer_reviews.text: beautiful shoe. impressive engineering design. price is at upper limit.
customer_reviews.author: stephen f nagy

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE SNEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: I was a Mizuno lover but this one is hard and not comfortable. These sneakers look like a hard plastic, too expensive for terrible shoe. Better back to the old and good Asics.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Rodrigo Andrian

customer_reviews.title: Running like the wind lol
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it came right on time the next day I had a test to take and I needed those running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamiane street

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. So well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: V. Man

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am going to buy another pair to keep as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Great aesthetics. Wore out very quickly after very little wear.
customer_reviews.author: Linde Oas

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about the shoe running on the small side (I'm an 11.5)... I bought the 12 and it was perfect. I have a narrower foot, and it fits like a glove. Awesome shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kreckmann

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it and use it for running ex.
customer_reviews.author: noel s.

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very narrow. I normally wear 11 1/2 wide in the Mizuno Wave Rider’s (flat feet) so I purchased the Prophecy 7’s in a 12. Still too narrow. Tight in the toe box, and inner part of the arch (flat feet). Without trying on, I can only assume the 12 1/2 would fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: It takes couple of times to mold them to your feet
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of runs to break them in, but once my feet adjusted to them, I can honestly say my run has improved a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Juan D Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great style and fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and coloring combination, they are nicer in person than pictured. The shoe fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them, most comfortable tennis shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are by far one of the top running shoes
customer_reviews.author: luis diaz

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He use them for work because of how comfortable they are. His back suffers less
customer_reviews.author: Nydia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but doesn’t have enough water resistance! Love running on them on even just hiking
customer_reviews.author: Subash Unni

customer_reviews.title: It’s smaller then the 6 or the generations before
customer_reviews.text: Could not use it, too small I bought the wave prophecy 6 size 10.5 fit great but the 7 generation is cut in a smaller mold.
customer_reviews.author: Nataniel  Jr. Martins

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I love the style.. That why I bought it. Here in Charlotte Nc you can’t even find it at all
customer_reviews.author: Jose pagan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. They fit great, they feel great, and they look better than great.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoesi have ever had. Will use it for October Chicago Marathon. I have used other Mizuno but these are really great ... anorher level of confort.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Saldarriaga

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit. Did not get paid to review this add.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool look; Awful comfort
customer_reviews.text: Sole too hard. Neat concept, but not at all comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Geminian77

customer_reviews.title: These support my 6'4" and 215 lb frame.
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno wave always work for me, these are my first prophecy pair and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L Eberhard

customer_reviews.title: Love the Wave Prophecy line. Not cheap shoe but excellent shoe for those who need the support.
customer_reviews.text: These were my 5th pair of wave prophecy. Extremely comfortable running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: The Shop-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: bought this product to a friend, it looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Chamoun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, I have several pairs of mizuno's, they are like walking on a cloud..
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: it feels you have a support for your foot when you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This trainers are for overweight people with very good cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: The are too/very expensive. But for me perfect shoes to long way running.
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof Czaderski

customer_reviews.title: Lack of durability
customer_reviews.text: Air pockets on both shoes busted within 4 months of normal use
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are exactly as expected and performed as advertised. I would purchase from the seller again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leverenz

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box!!
customer_reviews.text: Like my previous wave prophecies, 1st shoe I can wear right out of the box and not have to break them in. No hot spots or blisters on feet.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I think the ball is a little small. Please refer to when you wear It's so easy, it's fun to run
customer_reviews.author: kanghyun lee

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for broad feet.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome running shoe, unfortunately for me I have broad feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: the looks are intriguing;
customer_reviews.text: i typically run a 8.5; they came tight; i should had ordered a 9.
customer_reviews.author: John casey

customer_reviews.title: Shoes to small
customer_reviews.text: I always get the same size and this time the shoes are to small
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: This shoes can make you hop to the moon. No JOKE seriously comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is by far the most comfortable shoe of all time. It has made me better in the sack and i could not be happier. I have a better jump in my step because of them
customer_reviews.author: Justin Scarano

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for treadmill only!
customer_reviews.text: To be exact the fit "too small" was from the 12.5 size I returned -- the 13 I exchanged fits fine. However, the real problem with this shoe is the grooves in the sole collect tiny rocks as you run, so that when you get home, you have hundreds of them embedded. So if you like to sit around for 30 min after every run picking tiny rocks out of your shoes, this is the shoe for you! Luckily, I was about to buy new crosstrainer/knockaround shoes anyway, so, instead of returning them, these will become my most expensive casual shoes ever! Just buy the Mizuno Waveriders and save yourself $100.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More narrow than they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital on my feet for 12 hours and rarely get to sit down, my feet have been sore for years until I discovered this brand and model. This is the first time I’ve had issues with the narrow fitting. They seem to be running more narrow now
customer_reviews.author: Impulse Buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... and they start ripping in the front that's the worst shoes from the mizuno I'm disappointed I don't plan ...
customer_reviews.text: I have them for two weeks and they start ripping in the front that's the worst shoes from the mizuno I'm disappointed I don't plan spending another $200 for that kind a shoes good luck;(
customer_reviews.author: mostwanted

customer_reviews.title: The joke’s on you
customer_reviews.text: This might be the most overpriced, uncomfortable running shoe ever made. No, wait...it is. Where’s the cushioning? The sole is hard and the arch too high, and I have a med-high arch. This shoe came out April 1st didn’t it? Cause it’s gotta be a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Sath523

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes! My last pair lasted almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fantastic shoes! My last pair lasted almost 2 years! My old pair is actually still in pretty good shape... Cons: Expensive, but you get what you pay for with these!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley B. Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: 1 month in and the shoe started making a squealing and squeaking noise every time I walk. I cannot wear anymore as it's embarrassing to walk with the shoe making noise. I did not do anything to them and it has something to do with the shock or plastic plate. Avoid buying these they are way to expensive for them to be not wearable in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort and support!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband this is his 4th pair he loves how comfortable they are. These are my favorites !!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie tippie

customer_reviews.title: Size problem
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately slightly too big that’s the down side when you can’t try them on. I’ve had the previous prophecy which were 9’s I wouldnt mine being able to try the 81/2 but them the breaks. You have to where them to find out if they’re any good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve bootes

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: This are the best running shoes you can buy. If you're serious about running try them and if not, it's ok, you can also wear them for any occasion
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Zamarripa

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Prophecy 7 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Wave prophecy 7: for the runner who craves luxury and the ulitmate in long lasting responsive cushioning. The ultimate in cushioning continues to evolve with an improved step-in feel and a softer, lighter upper for runners seeking luxury and an unparalleled ride.
feature_bullets: Fit in motion upper for flexible support
Soft anatomical sockliner for extra arch support and cushioning
U4ic Midsole for cushioning and optimal shock attenuation
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
